Big update, right on time for the holidays!
- Xmas special stock videos, sounds, and a new North filter. 
- Vignette tool under Effects.
- More masks, with rounded corners and feathering.
- 4K export on supported devices. 
- Move & transform clips just like other layers. 
Merry Xmas!

Yet another mostly bug-fix update, with a hidden gem: you can now raise audio volume above 100%

Say hello to Videoleap's highly requested new feature: Reverse! Now you can reverse both clips and Audio layers with a single tap. But wait, there's more!
- We've added the psychedelic Kaleido feature to the Effects category for some truly out of this world visuals.
- Preview videos and images using 3D touch before adding them to your project.
- Chroma feature's behind the scenes tune-up makes your green screen scenes look even better! 
- Make your project epic with the new "Riser" Sound Effect in the Trailers category.
- And in case you missed the last update: you can now raise the volume level for any clip or Audio layer above 100%. Like, waaay above!

Be on the lookout for more awesome features soon. Meanwhile, we'll gladly answer any questions you may have - so give us a shout out here:
videoleap.support@lightricks.com

Thanks for all your continued feedback and support,
The Videoleap Team

Enhance your masterpiece with stock footage! Millions of stock photos and videos are waiting for you under the Stock tab when choosing media to add to your project. And there's more:
- Full Live Photo support! You can now choose to add Live Photos as videos.
- Apply your favorite transition to all your videos with the newly added import settings, or choose a random transition for some fun!

Be on the lookout for more awesome features soon. Meanwhile, we'll gladly answer any questions you may have - so give us a shout out here:
videoleap.support@lightricks.com

Thanks for all your continued feedback and support,
The Videoleap Team

Finally got your new iPhone XS Max, but then had issues with saving your Videoleap masterpieces to the Camera Roll? This update should help you with that!
And if you haven't noticed, there are now millions of stock photos and videos waiting for you under the Stock tab when choosing media to add to your project. 
And there's more:
- Transitions can be applyed to all your videos at once with the newly added import settings. You can even choose a random transition for some fun!
- Full Live Photo support - choose to add Live Photos as videos or as images.
- Modified our Terms of Use agreement. Please take a look, it's here: https://static.lightricks.com/legal/terms-of-use.pdf
 
Be on the lookout for more awesome features soon. Meanwhile, we'll gladly answer any questions you may have - so give us a shout out here:
videoleap.support@lightricks.com

Thanks for all your continued feedback and support,
The Videoleap Team

- The Iris transition can now be applied in reverse! And more transitions are coming soon.
- Thousands of new videos and images were added to our Stock tab, be sure to check them out!

- Many under the hood improvements should help users with a lot of iCloud assets have a much better experience.
- Text should work faster in projects with heavy text usage, and stroke looks much nicer!
- Photos load faster and play smoother.

Be on the lookout for more awesome features soon. Meanwhile, we'll gladly answer any questions you may have - so give us a shout out here:

Big update, right on time for the holidays!
- Special Text Effects to make any composition shine.
- Animation Presets will enable you to animate your text and video layers with ease.
- Import your videos, images and audio from anywhere by importing directly from the Files App.
- Add Cinematic Lens Flares for a professional look.
- We've fixed some bugs and added some controls in the Text feature.

Be on the lookout for more awesome features soon. Meanwhile, we'll gladly answer any questions you may have - so give us a shout out here:
videoleap.support@lightricks.com

Thanks for all your continued feedback and support,
The Videoleap Team

Good news for our Japanese speakers! We've added brand new Japanese fonts for you. Check them out in the Text feature and tell us what you think.
Now for everyone: you can search Getty assets in any language, not only English. Find stock videos more easily.

P.S. Missed our big 1.8 update? Here's what you need to know:
- We added Voiceover. This was the #1 user requested feature and we worked hard to bring it to you. Now you can narrate videos right in Videoleap!
- We've added Cut Frame. This means you can freeze any frame in your videos!
- Smoother scrolling on timeline.
- Find already purchased stock assets in the new Purchased tab. This will make your life just a little bit easier ;)
- Speaking of easier, keyframe and layer selection is also simpler. Try it out.
- Squashed some bugs and made improvements to your overall experience.

Got questions? Feature requests? Drop us a line at: videoleap.support@lightricks.com

See you soon with more features & content!

大家好，我们认识一下拖放 2.0 吧！

拖放 2.0 是什么意思？它是指您可以随意将拖动剪辑将其变为图层，反之亦然。不仅如此，现在您还可以直接从时间线删除剪辑和图层！那有多好啊？太棒了。本次更新中的其他内容：

- 增添了 3 个新文本效果：黄金、闪烁和水。
- 我们为所有功能启用了动画预设。淡入滤镜和镜头眩光（带有样式）！
- 重新设计了导出屏幕，提供更多分享选项。
- 本地化翻译了所有滤镜和文本效果名称。
- 修复了一些错误，进一步提升了性能。

您有任何问题或功能请求？欢迎告诉我们，邮箱地址为 videoleap.support@lightricks.com

此致
Videoleap 团队

超级想要文本动画？我们也
是如此！我们调整、改进甚至添加了新动画，给您更多额外选项。具体情况如下：

- 按字母、单词或行自定义一些动画。选择您的预设 - 如果出现 3 个点，再次轻点！
- 5 种文本进入的新方式
- 3 种文本出去的新方式
- 1 个全新整体文本动画
- 最后但同样重要，轻松剪裁！是的，剪辑现在剪裁时可以变成图层。

还有更多好主意？联系我们：videoleap.support@lightricks.com

最好的祝福，

Hello Videoleapers!

We bring you a small yet important update, laying the groundwork for some awesome new features that will be coming to you very soon. In the meantime, here's what you can find in this version:

- In Canvas there is a new 4:5 ratio. Especially exciting for you posting on Instagram! (which, let's face it, means all of us)
- Transitions UI has been redesigned! Now you can preview transitions from the toolbar before selecting them. Also be on the lookout for many new ones in our next update!
- Took care of some pesky export failure issues.
- Overall smoother performance while editing.

We want to take this opportunity to thank you for using Videoleap for all your video editing needs! We are always happy to hear your thoughts so drop us a line at: videoleap.support@lightricks.com

Yours,
The Videoleap Team

Hello our beloved Videoleapers,

You asked for them, you got them! We added many new and exciting transitions for you to play with, from cinematic blur & lens flares to psychedelic kaleidoscopes and glitches. Be sure to tap the 3 dots that appear on some selected transitions for even more options.

And that's not all!

We're super happy to share with you a brand new feature-- Stickers! Enjoy a variety of high quality animated stickers, plus all the GIFs you can handle courtesy of our friends at GIPHY. Go wild!

Look forward to more awesome transitions, stickers and other Pro content. Feel like we missed something? Drop us a line at: videoleap.support@lightricks.com

Dream on,
The Videoleap team

我们为大家准备了你们想要的功能！我们增加了很多炫酷的过渡效果供您体验，从电影模糊效果和镜头光晕效果到迷幻万花筒和故障效果。记得轻点选择的过渡效果上的 3 点标记，查看更多选项。

亲爱的 Videoleap 用户：

在这一版本中，我们修复了发现的问题，并增加了一些激动人心的功能。我们已经迫不及待地要与大家分享！

首先，我们增加了图层锁定功能。现在，您可以轻松将层固定到剪辑中，让它们可以一起移动。

其次，现在您可以替换每个层的片段，但是不会丢失之前已经完成的编辑。只需要选择剪辑或层，轻点“替换”，接着选择新文件即可！

下面列出了我们最近修复的问题：
- 在过渡后添加关键帧不会再出现黑框。
- 准确冻结帧的颜色（不会太亮也不会太暗）。
- 解决了 iOS14 中的文本问题。
- 过渡支持准确查看，包括缩放和分形。
- 解决了循环资源倒放失败的问题。
- 音频层可以显示音轨的标题。
- 改进了整体时间线表现。

感谢大家一如既往地支持和反馈。

Videoleap用户，大家好：

新年到了，我们已经完成我们愿望清单中的几个项目：

- 更有运动感：我们现在可以在编辑栏上进行分割了！只需轻轻一点，即可分割视频、图像、声音和效果。
- 更易调整：我们现在使用经过全面改进的调整工具，外观看起来更棒，工作速度也更快。
- 更加专注（散焦）：具有散焦效果的照片现在可以采取各种尺寸和分辨率导出 - 不再有任何干扰。

而且，这只是个开始。
